title: From Greenland to Iran: Trump’s threats stretch far and wide since his Venezuela strike | CNN
description: Since the seizure of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro by US forces at the weekend, US President Donald Trump and members of his administration have issued warnings to several other governments — including those of Colombia, Cuba, Mexico, Iran and Greenland, a self-governing territory of Denmark.

title: Trump’s Venezuela raid plunges Greenland and the Western military alliance into uncertainty | CNN
description: Amid increasing concerns that Greenland, a vast Arctic territory ruled by Denmark, is still being coveted by the Trump administration, the Danish prime minister has delivered a stark warning to the White House.

title: Greenland MP responds to Trump’s warnings | CNN
description: President Donald Trump has warned a number of countries, including Greenland, after U.S. strikes on Venezuela. CNN’s Isa Soares gets reaction from Greenland Prime Minister Kuno Fencker.

title: Trump renews calls to take over Greenland — as admin warns Cuba ‘is in a lot of trouble’ — after Maduro capture
description: A day after the US captured Venezuelan dictator Nicolas Maduro, President Trump renewed his calls for an American takeover of the Danish territory of Greenland, while his top diplomat declared the communist government in Cuba is “in a lot of trouble.”

title: Denmark prime minister calls on Trump to "stop the threats" about Greenland
description: President Trump has repeatedly claimed that making Greenland part of the United States would serve U.S. national security interests, given its strategic location in the Arctic.

title: Denmark prime minister calls on Trump to "stop the threats" about Greenland

title: Denmark's prime minister says 'stop the threats' of U.S. annexing Greenland
description: The wife of Trump's deputy chief of staff Stephen Miller posted a photo implying a U.S. takeover of Greenland, hours after the U.S. attacks on Venezuela.

title: Trump renews push to annex Greenland after Venezuela strike
description: President Donald Trump has repeatedly talked about annexing Greenland. He reupped those calls hours after the U.S. captured Venezuela's leader.

title: After Maduro, who's next? Trump spurs speculation about his plans for Greenland, Cuba and Colombia
description: A day after the ouster of Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro, President Donald Trump is renewing his calls for an American takeover of the Danish territory of Greenland and is threatening Colombia with military action over its drug trade.
